Posts.Content: Katrina5558 wrote: I was diagnosed with IDC stage 1-2 on March 12 and still have no surgery date. I am having trouble flinging a decent surgeon through my HMO and they have been giving me the run around with denials and appeals processes and I am starting to freak out that it's been so long and I still haven't started any treatment. All I can think about is there is cancer in my body and nobody is doing anything about it. Is this common to wait this long?Â  Log in to post a reply
Posts.Title: How long after diagnosis did you have surgery? Katrina5558 Kicks
